markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Garrote Bolt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=888)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale](/Sources.aspx?ID=51) pg. 77

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** bolt

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The shaft of this silver bolt is engraved with wiry designs. When a _garrote bolt_ hits a target, it transforms into a silver garrote and wraps around one of the target's appendages, dealing an additional 2d12 [persistent slashing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). On a critical hit, it wraps around the target's throat, and the target can't breathe until the persistent damage ends.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Garrote Bolt
primary_source: Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale pg. 77
